name: Community Care Concepts of Woolwich, Wellesley and Wilmot Townships - Meals on Wheels
comment:
Hot meals delivered Mon-Fri at 12noon and consist of soup, salad, entrée and dessert * special diet types available

Frozen Meal Service - Frozen meal packages are delivered * clients choose from a menu or can choose standard packages * special diet types available * soup/dessert packages also available
